archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Close Customer Bill Inquiry Report
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Close a customer bill inquiry report when the bill inquiry/complaint has been resolved.

properties.value: The objective of the Close Customer Bill Inquiry Report processes is to close a customer bill inquiry report when the bill inquiry/complaint has been resolved. These processes monitor the status of all open customer bill inquiry reports, and recognize that a customer bill inquiry report is ready to be closed when the status is changed to cleared.
